section.p: To uninstall a Metrics Agent or a Log Agent, proceed as follows:

li.p: Log in to the Control Machine.
Open the configuration file of the Control Machine with your favorite editor.
Check that the hosts from which to uninstall an agent are configured correctly. Multiple instances of an agent are uninstalled if multiple hosts are specified in the file.
The IP address of the remote machines as well as the user name of the user who is to uninstall the agent must be specified.
li.note: The user who uninstalls the agents must have access to the corresponding hosts. Access as a user with root privileges is required.
